name: Adam and Ricky (Alpha Demo)
description:
Filled with a lengthy and expansive main quest that will take us through multiple historical eras, and set in a beautiful hand crafted world with countless secrets to discover, Adam and Ricky is a pixel art action RPG that pits two unlikely heroes against a terrible evil from the future.

Switch between ranged and melee combat depending on the situation, or play both roles in cooperative with a friend and execute spectacular combos!

Tons of magical items that grant unique skills and new ways of playing the game. Find them by killing enemies, completing quests, or collecting rare materials to craft these powerful artifacts.

Dive deep into each character's special talent trees and explore new builds, from the fast and efficient killing machines, to the most unorthodox and wacky ones imaginable.

Loads of optional quests that will slowly reveal the lore behind a world far more mysterious than it seems.
